title: Track Awesome Esports Updates Weekly
_seo_title: Track Awesome Esports (Strift/awesome-esports) Updates Weekly - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of open-source projects related to esports.

items.title: Awesome Esports Updates on Sep 18 - Sep 24, 2023
items.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Sep 18 - Sep 24, 2023
items.content_text:
### Libraries / APIs & Web Services

*   [SteamUser (⭐976)](https://github.com/DoctorMcKay/node-steam-user) - A Node.js library for interacting with the Steam network via the Steam client protocol.

### Libraries / Data parsing and analysis

*   [awpy (⭐467)](https://github.com/pnxenopoulos/awpy) - A Python library for parsing, analyzing, and visualizing CS:GO data.

### Developer tools / Tournaments management

*   [Fortnite VSCode Theme (⭐172)](https://github.com/sdras/fortnite-vscode-theme) - A Visual Studio Code theme inspired by Fortnite.

### Applications & Tools / Tournaments management

*   [LeagueStats (⭐459)](https://github.com/vkaelin/LeagueStats) - A website for League of Legends summoners' stats.

### Education / Tournaments management

*   [League of Legends Analytics (⭐77)](https://github.com/FloPrm/lol_analytics) - A collection of League of Legends data-related guides, libraries, and learning materials for Data Analysts.
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Esports Updates on Aug 22 - Aug 28, 2022

items.content_text:
### Applications & Tools / Tournaments management

*   [Foldy Sheet (⭐2)](https://github.com/chhopsky/foldysheet) - A Python script to determine whether teams can make playoffs or not.

items.title: Awesome Esports Updates on Feb 21 - Feb 27, 2022

*   SteamID - A library for manipulating Steam IDs.
    *   [Node.js (⭐70)](https://github.com/DoctorMcKay/node-steamid)

items.title: Awesome Esports Updates on Feb 14 - Feb 20, 2022
items.summary: 4 awesome projects updated on Feb 14 - Feb 20, 2022
items.content_text:
### Libraries / APIs & Web Services

*   [Steam Community (⭐513)](https://github.com/DoctorMcKay/node-steamcommunity) - A Node.js library for interacting with the Steam Community website.
*   [Steam TOTP (⭐248)](https://github.com/DoctorMcKay/node-steam-totp) - A Node.js library for generating Steam-style 2FA codes.

### Libraries / Authentication

*   [Passport-Steam (⭐353)](https://github.com/liamcurry/passport-steam) - A Node.js passport authentication strategy for Steam.

### Libraries / Team management

*   [LoL in-house bot (⭐115)](https://github.com/mrtolkien/inhouse_bot) - A Discord bot handling role queue, matchmaking, and rankings for League of Legends in-house games.
items.content_html:
Libraries / APIs & Web Services

  • Steam Community (⭐513) - A Node.js library for interacting with the Steam Community website.
  • Steam TOTP (⭐248) - A Node.js library for generating Steam-style 2FA codes.

Libraries / Authentication

  • Passport-Steam (⭐353) - A Node.js passport authentication strategy for Steam.

Libraries / Team management

  • LoL in-house bot (⭐115) - A Discord bot handling role queue, matchmaking, and rankings for League of Legends in-house games.

items.title: Awesome Esports Updates on Jan 17 - Jan 23, 2022
items.summary: 11 awesome projects updated on Jan 17 - Jan 23, 2022
items.content_text:
### Libraries / APIs & Web Services

*   [Blizzard.js (⭐147)](https://github.com/benweier/blizzard.js) - A Node.js library for interacting with the Blizzard Community Platform API.
*   [HLTV (⭐443)](https://github.com/gigobyte/HLTV) - A Node.js library for interacting with the HLTV API.
*   [liquipediapy (⭐69)](https://github.com/c00kie17/liquipediapy) - A Python library for interacting with the Liquipedia API.
*   [valorant.js (⭐107)](https://github.com/liamcottle/valorant.js) - A Node.js library for interacting with the VALORANT APIs used in game.

### Libraries / Data parsing and analysis

*   [Cassiopeia (⭐560)](https://github.com/meraki-analytics/cassiopeia) - A Python framework for interacting with and analyzing data from the Riot Games League of Legends API.

### Unofficial documentation / Tournaments management

*   [BNETDocs (⭐34)](https://github.com/BNETDocs/bnetdocs-web) - A documentation and discussion website for Blizzard and Battle.net protocols.
*   [Rift Explorer (⭐560)](https://github.com/Pupix/rift-explorer) - An automatically generated documentation of Riot Games LCU API.
*   [valorant-api-docs (⭐526)](https://github.com/techchrism/valorant-api-docs) - An automatically generated documentation of Valorant internal API.

### Applications & Tools / Tournaments management

*   [Esport Team Logos (⭐29)](https://github.com/lootmarket/esport-team-logos) - A database of Esports teams logos.
*   [Boltobserv (⭐314)](https://github.com/boltgolt/boltobserv) - An external Counter-Strike: Global Offensive radar for observers.
*   [Open Dota (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/odota/core) - A website for Dota 2 esports stats.
items.content_html:
Libraries / APIs & Web Services

  • Blizzard.js (⭐147) - A Node.js library for interacting with the Blizzard Community Platform API.
  • HLTV (⭐443) - A Node.js library for interacting with the HLTV API.
  • liquipediapy (⭐69) - A Python library for interacting with the Liquipedia API.
  • valorant.js (⭐107) - A Node.js library for interacting with the VALORANT APIs used in game.

Libraries / Data parsing and analysis

  • Cassiopeia (⭐560) - A Python framework for interacting with and analyzing data from the Riot Games League of Legends API.

Unofficial documentation / Tournaments management

  • BNETDocs (⭐34) - A documentation and discussion website for Blizzard and Battle.net protocols.
  • Rift Explorer (⭐560) - An automatically generated documentation of Riot Games LCU API.
  • valorant-api-docs (⭐526) - An automatically generated documentation of Valorant internal API.

Applications & Tools / Tournaments management

  • Esport Team Logos (⭐29) - A database of Esports teams logos.
  • Boltobserv (⭐314) - An external Counter-Strike: Global Offensive radar for observers.
  • Open Dota (⭐1.5k) - A website for Dota 2 esports stats.

items.title: Awesome Esports Updates on Dec 27 - Jan 02, 2021
items.summary: 9 awesome projects updated on Dec 27 - Jan 02, 2021
items.content_text:
### Libraries / APIs & Web Services

*   [Discord.js (⭐26k)](https://github.com/discordjs/discord.js) - A Node.js library for interacting with the Discord API.
*   [steam (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/ValvePython/steam/) - A Python library for interacting with various parts of Steam.

### Libraries / Data parsing and analysis

*   [Boxcars (⭐119)](https://github.com/nickbabcock/boxcars) - A Rust library for parsing Rocket League replays.
*   [Clarity (⭐685)](https://github.com/skadistats/clarity) - A Java library for parsing CS:GO and Dota 2 replays.
*   [demoinfocs-golang (⭐825)](https://github.com/markus-wa/demoinfocs-golang) - A Go library for parsing and analyzing CS:GO demos (ie. replays.)
*   [Rattletrap (⭐155)](https://github.com/tfausak/rattletrap) - A Haskell library for parsing and generating Rocket League replays.

### Libraries / Tournaments management

*   [brackets-manager.js (⭐282)](https://github.com/Drarig29/brackets-manager.js) - A JavaScript library to manage tournament brackets.
*   [brackets-viewer.js (⭐196)](https://github.com/Drarig29/brackets-viewer.js) - A JavaScript library to display tournament brackets.

### Applications & Tools / Tournaments management

*   [LeagueDirector (⭐915)](https://github.com/RiotGames/leaguedirector) - A desktop application for staging and recording videos from League of Legends replays.
items.content_html:
Libraries / APIs & Web Services

  • Discord.js (⭐26k) - A Node.js library for interacting with the Discord API.
  • steam (⭐1.2k) - A Python library for interacting with various parts of Steam.

Libraries / Data parsing and analysis

  • Boxcars (⭐119) - A Rust library for parsing Rocket League replays.
  • Clarity (⭐685) - A Java library for parsing CS:GO and Dota 2 replays.
  • demoinfocs-golang (⭐825) - A Go library for parsing and analyzing CS:GO demos (ie. replays.)
  • Rattletrap (⭐155) - A Haskell library for parsing and generating Rocket League replays.

Libraries / Tournaments management

  • brackets-manager.js (⭐282) - A JavaScript library to manage tournament brackets.
  • brackets-viewer.js (⭐196) - A JavaScript library to display tournament brackets.

Applications & Tools / Tournaments management

  • LeagueDirector (⭐915) - A desktop application for staging and recording videos from League of Legends replays.
